introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text1: Welcome to 'Tailor-made Vacations'. By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please review them carefully.

bookingAndReservations.title: Booking and reservations
bookingAndReservations.text1: Booking Process: All bookings are made through our website or contact form. By completing a booking, you accept these terms and conditions.
bookingAndReservations.text2: Payment: Full payment or a deposit is required to confirm your booking. Payment details will be provided via email.
bookingAndReservations.text3: Cancellation Policy: Cancellations must be submitted in writing. Refunds are subject to our cancellation policy as detailed below.

cancellationAndRefunds.title: Cancellation and refunds
cancellationAndRefunds.text1: Client-Initiated Cancellations: If you cancel your booking, refunds will be processed according to the following schedule:

ul1.li1: Cancellations made more than 30 days before the start date: Full refund minus a processing fee
ul1.li2: Cancellations made 15-30 days before the start date: 50% refund
ul1.li3: Cancellations made less than 15 days before the start date: No refund

cancellationAndRefunds.text2: Company-Initiated Cancellations: If we need to cancel your booking due to unforeseen circumstances, we will provide a full refund or offer alternative dates.

changesToBooking.title: Changes to booking
changesToBooking.text1: Client-Initiated Changes: Requests to modify booking dates or details must be submitted in writing. We will accommodate changes when possible, subject to availability and potential additional fees.
changesToBooking.text2: Company-Initiated Changes: We reserve the right to modify your itinerary due to circumstances beyond our control. We will notify you promptly and offer suitable alternatives.

accommodation.title: Accommodation and dining
accommodation.text1: Quality Assurance: We strive to provide high-quality accommodation and dining experiences. However, we cannot guarantee specific standards as they depend on third-party providers.
accommodation.text2: Client Responsibility: You are responsible for informing us of any dietary restrictions, allergies, or preferences in advance.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.text1: Vehicles and Drivers: We provide luxury vehicles and professional drivers to ensure safe and comfortable transportation. We are not liable for delays caused by traffic, weather conditions, or other unforeseen events.
transportation.text2: Client Responsibility: Clients must be ready at designated pickup times. Delays may result in missed transportation or additional charges.

activitiesAndItineraries.title: Activities and itineraries
activitiesAndItineraries.text1: Activity Participation: Participation in all activities is at your own risk. We are not responsible for any injuries, accidents, or losses that occur during activities.
activitiesAndItineraries.text2: Itinerary Changes: We reserve the right to modify itineraries due to weather, safety concerns, or other operational factors. Clients will be notified of changes at the earliest opportunity.

healthAndSafety.title: Health and safety
healthAndSafety.text1: Company Responsibility: We prioritize client safety and take reasonable precautions. However, we are not liable for injuries, illnesses, or accidents beyond our reasonable control.
healthAndSafety.text2: Client Responsibility: You must disclose any medical conditions, disabilities, or special requirements that may affect your participation. We strongly recommend comprehensive travel insurance.

privacyAndDataProtection.title: Privacy and data protection
privacyAndDataProtection.text1: Data Collection: We collect personal information necessary for booking and providing our services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data securely.
privacyAndDataProtection.text2: Data Use: Your personal data will not be shared with third parties except as required to deliver our services, and we comply with applicable data protection laws.

complaintsAndDisputes.title: Complaints and disputes
complaintsAndDisputes.text1: Complaints: Any complaints must be submitted in writing within 7 days of your vacation completion. We will investigate and respond in a timely manner.
complaintsAndDisputes.text2: Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from these terms will first be attempted to be resolved through good-faith negotiation. If unresolved, disputes may be referred to mediation, arbitration, or the appropriate legal jurisdiction.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.title: Governing law and jurisdiction
governingLawAndJurisdiction.text1: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/Region]. Any disputes arising from or in connection with these Terms and Conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of [Your Country/Region].
